channel.title: The Gut & Bone Show
channel.description: This is a talk show where I share with you guests and topics that tend to be a little bit obscured from everyday people like you and me! So tune in and PARTICIPATE!
channel.itunes:subtitle: A talk show where I share with you, guests and topics that are somewhat obscured from everyday people like you and me.
channel.itunes:author: Robert Bradbury
channel.itunes:summary: This is a talk show where I share with you guests and topics that tend to be a little bit obscured from everyday people like you and me! So tune in and PARTICIPATE!

item.title: Steven Meyers - Author-Lecturer-Researcher of The Great Pyramid
item.description: Join me this week as I talk it up with Steven Myers who has a unique and very interesting perspective on how and why the Great Pyramid was built. He has produced some surprising facts and theories that will move you into wonder. I have talked with Steven on “got paranormal?” with host S.E. Burns and found this story very interesting. Since then Steven has produced a huge library of videos, demonstrating his theories with animations that you will find amazing as well. Author, lecturer and independent researcher, Steven Myers has studied the Great Pyramid for over twenty years to understand how this ancient wonder of the world was built and why. His research included traveling to Egypt to conduct extensive on-site research at the Giza Plateau. Steven Myers has written numerous magazine articles and given many lectures on the subject of the Great Pyramid. Compiling his research into two books , Steven Myers has provide a comprehensive and detailed explanation of how the Great Pyramid was built. He contends that advanced technologies were used to build the Great Pyramid. Check out his site at www.thepump.org and catch my show every Monday at 5:30 PM EST at www.para-x.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Bradbury

Author, lecturer and independent researcher, Steven Myers has studied the Great Pyramid for over twenty years to understand how this ancient wonder of the world was built and why. His research included traveling to Egypt to conduct extensive on-site research at the Giza Plateau.
Steven Myers has written numerous magazine articles and given many lectures on the subject of the Great Pyramid. Check out his site at www.thepump.org
and catch my show every Monday at 5:30 PM EST at www.para-x.com

item.title: Jeffery Hinchey and Selena Fox for this memorial day show
item.description: This was a last minute show. I was not going to be live but I decided to anyway. I was suppose to play a pre recorded interview with Robbie Thomas but that did not pan out. That will be at the end of June. ( I plan it to be anyway ) Feel free to tune in live on Mondays at 5:30 PM EST at www.para-x.com NEXT WEEK STEVEN MYERS TELLS US HOW AND WHY THE PYRAMIDS WERE BUILT

item.title: SHAUN UNDERWOOD was a no show-Robert Simcox and Bradley Lockerman saved the show.
item.description: As far as a Live show goes.... this was a disaster. Half hour late start because of server issues, the guest was a no show and then the loss of internet connection. I did my best and it only took an hour! I hope you enjoy.
item.dc:creator: Robert Bradbury
item.itunes:summary: As far as a Live show goes.... this was a disaster. Half hour late start because of server issues, the guest was a no show and then the loss of internet connection. I did my best and it only took an hour! I hope you enjoy.

item.title: Joe Montaldo - Alien Abduction/ I.C.A.R. Part two
item.description: This week Joe Montaldo "RETURNS" as promised. We touched on some fascinating stuff last time and we shall pick right back up where we left off. DO NOT MISS THIS ONE...... Joe Montaldo is Co-Founder, International Director, and Spokesperson for I.C.A.R. the International Community for Alien Research. (www.icar1.com) Originally affiliated with MUFON as an Investigator, Mr. Montaldo became disenchanted with the lack of information being shared with the general public. His first step in furthering public awareness was establishing a personal website (www.alienenigma) in 1998. Later, the I.C.A.R. site (www.icar1.com) was added to the Internet.

item.title: David Weatherly – Author – ” The Black Eyed Children ”
item.description: David Weatherly is a paranormal investigator and author. For over 35 years he has explored the world of the strange, investigating cases around the country and abroad. He has written and lectured on a diverse range of topics including Cryptozoology, Ufology and Hauntings. David has also studied Shamanic and magical traditions with elders from numerous cultures including Europe, Tibet, Native America and Africa. He has appeared on numerous radio programs including: Darkness Radio, Project White Paper, Haunted South and Paranormal Live. He is a writer for Intrepid Magazine and is the author of “The Black Eyed Children” TUNE IN LIVE ON MONDAY MAY 7 AT 5:30 PM EST http://www.paraxradionetwork.com/ Check David out on Facebook —> http://www.facebook.com/david.weatherly.31

item.title: Stan Romanek-Author-Alien Contactee/Abductee
item.description: Holy Crap! What a fascinating show... Stan was great but his associates were listening. They did all they could do to stop the show but we kept it going.The beginning was late from tech issues and towards the end there was a problem also but we got through them all.. So take a listen and enjoy! It was a great conversation and we all had a blast! Enjoy!

item.title: Keith Age - Author and Paranormal Investigator
item.description: This week signifies a couple different things. One ...I began broadcasting on a new network. And two...Keith Age's second time on the show! Keith has worked with the Booth Brothers for many years and has been involved with the paranormal for 30 years. We gave away tickets to Mid Ohio Para-Con. and just talked. It was a great time and you can find out more about Keith Age ---> http://www.louisvilleghs.com/

item.title: Haunted Tour Companies and some Ghost talk
item.description: This week the topic was suppose to be completely about 3 different Haunted Tours. One of the representatives could not make it but I did talk to two of them and it made for a great show. From Sleepy Hollow Of Gettysburg = http://www.sleepyhollowofgettysburg.com/ Ken Zaveckas From Cincinnati Tours Inc. = http://www.hauntedcincinnatitours.com/ Dan Smith Take a listen it was a great show.

item.title: Scott Alan Roberts - Author- " The Rise And Fall Of The Nephilim"
item.description: Scotty Roberts Art Director, Illustrator, Designer, Historian, Theologian, Writer Having spent the bulk of the last twenty-five years in advertising as a creative director, designer and illustrator, Scotty's background is laced with varied and diverse skills and experience in the publishing, audio and visual fields. He possesses an astute flare for the visually dramatic, and carries that over from print to film. After two years in a Christian bible college, he entered seminary pursuing his Masters in Divinity (Mdiv) and worked as a youth director. During his college and seminary studies, he focused on his academic and personal passion for history, theater and art. His religious studies intensified his interest in spirituality, and his research of the Paranormal expanded throughout the following years. Shortly after his seminary years, Scotty began a small comic book publishing effort, writing and illustrationg stories, which were also pitched as animated television series. He developed and published the highly successful Ancient Heroes trading card series, and began development on a series of young readers chapter books. He authored and illustrated his first historical teen readers novel, The Rollicking Adventures of Tam O'Hare, which garnered success in the teen and college markets. Scotty's current projects include, Tam O'Hare and the Banshee of BallyGlenMorrow - the second in his series of Tam O'Hare historical novels; and a more scholarly effort,The Rise and Fall of the Nephilim, published by New Page Books and set for release January 2012. The book explores biblical, apochryphal and ancient Mesopotamian accounts of extraterrestrial and spirit visitation, and comparative Flood mythologies.

Scotty's current projects include, Tam O'Hare and the Banshee of BallyGlenMorrow - the second in his series of Tam O'Hare historical novels; and a more scholarly effort,The Rise and Fall of the Nephilim, published by New Page Books and set for release January 2012. item.title: Joe Montaldo - Alien Abduction/ I.C.A.R.
item.description: Join me this week as Joe Montaldo shares his expertise in the field of Alien Abduction. I Had no idea there were experts out there and luckily for all of us Joe is out there! Find out all you need to know by joining us and asking your own questions in the chat room! Find out more about him and what he does —-> http://www.icar1.com/About_Us.html

item.title: David Kowalsky - Founder/Director of Cannabis Information Network
item.description: Join me this week as I talk with with David Kowalsky who is instrumental in a campain to help break down some of the myths and reasons why Marijauna gets such a bad wrap. Over 83 million Americans over the age of 12 have tried marijuana at least once. Over 12 million had used the drug in the month before the survey. The Cannabis Information Network (CIN) was founded in May 2011. The conceptual idea for this organization was simply to campaign the repeal of federal marijuana prohibition on a social media platform, I have come to learn that this method has been mostly ineffective in communicating the message that, it is “The People” that want marijuana legalization. The Cannabis Information Network is becoming the most dynamic, volunteer-powered and supported pro marijuana legalization organization that is powered by “The People”.

item.title: Reverend Tim Shaw - Ordained Minister/Paranormal
item.description: Tim Shaw is a Psychic Medium, Reiki Master Teacher, Spiritualist Healer, Ordained Minister, Urban Shaman, Backwoods Primitive Trekker, Flintknapper, Urban Explorer, Traditional Leatherworker, Historical Re-Enactor, Radio Show Host, Author, and Speaker. He is the host of the Internationally Acclaimed Black Cat Lounge heard each Thursday at 8PM EST on the Para-X Radio Network. You can tune in "LIVE" every Monday at 7 PM EST at www.tenacityradio.com/listen

item.title: Deana Demko - mode l/ actress / sculptress
item.description: Deana is a model, actress, sculptress and even at one time a tv host. She has been in over 55 movies and has been seen in over 10 countries. Her photo has been in over 20 magazines. She has been interviewed on the radio and tv shows such as Comcast CN8 Family Talk, Vampires ch. 34 Manhattan cable, Showtime, The Daily Show, The Ru Paul Show , the Deana Show, Mtv , HBO , Cinemax and others. She is the sculptress of the Little Replicants - one of a kind sculptures all done in colored clay. She also enjoys modeling and at one time was the model for the comic book Delicious Dripping's main character Raven. She loves animals and horror movies.

item.description: This week I invited a couple of hosts from other shows on Tenacity Radio Network to join me and share their views on Politics and a few other issues on everyone's minds these days. I had a great time and you will too! take a listen.

item.title: Davis Samantha Carr-Goat Farming-Products derived from
item.description: Tune in this week, as my guest is a top rated Goat Farmer. I know this is not typical for The Gut And Bone Show... But this is one fascinating topic. One that many people believe just my be vital to survival as socitey and the way we live changes. I mean cmon... If you can get milk, cheese, soap all from a lawn mower... why pay for all of those things? I think we need to start thinking like this as a species and really start making a difference in our own lives. The rest will come naturally. Learn more of her and her Goats here ---> http://www.davisrunnubians.com/

item.title: Marie D Jones - Author - Destiny vs. Choice:The scientific and spiritual evidence behind fate and free will
item.description: "Marie Jones has joined the list of forward-thinking individuals who are taking us to the next level in both science and our understanding of the universe and our place in it." --Jim Marrs, author of New York Times Bestseller "Alien Agenda" Marie is a best-selling author, screenwriter, researcher, radio show host and public speaker. She is the author of "2013: END OF DAYS OR A NEW BEGINNING- ENVISIONING THE WORLD AFTER THE EVENTS OF 2012," "PSIENCE - HOW NEW DISCOVERIES IN QUANTUM PHYSICS AND NEW SCIENCE MAY EXPLAIN THE EXISTENCE OF PARANORMAL PHENOMENA," and "LOOKING FOR GOD IN ALL THE WRONG PLACES." Marie’s newest book is "DESTINY VS. CHOICE: THE SCIENTIFIC AND SPIRITUAL EVIDENCE BEHIND FATE AND FREE WILL." She also co-authored, "SUPERVOLCANO: THE CATASTROPHIC EVENT THAT CHANGED THE COURSE OF HUMAN HISTORY" written with her father, geophysicist Dr. John M. Savino, and "11:11- THE TIME PROMPT PHENOMENON- THE MEANING BEHIND MYSTERIOUS SIGNS, SEQUENCES AND SYNCHRONICITIES," and "THE RESONANCE KEY: EXPLORING THE LINKS BETWEEN VIBRATION, CONSCIOUSNESS AND THE ZERO POINT GRID" with Larry Flaxman, her partner in ParaExplorers (www.paraexplorers.com). Their newest books are “THE DEJA VU ENIGMA: A JOURNEY THROUGH THE ANOMALIES OF MIND, MEMORY AND TIME" and "THE TRINITY SECRET: THE POWER OF THREE AND THE CODE OF CREATION." Their next book, due in July 2012 is "THIS BOOK IS FROM THE FUTURE: A JOURNEY THROUGH PORTALS, RELATIVITY, WORMHOLES AND OTHER ADVENTURES IN TIME TRAVEL." They are also the authors of the ParaExplorers Series eBook collection of paranormal and scientific writings. Marie is also a screenwriter currently developing "Twilight Child," a science fiction feature film and a paranormal horror film called "19 Hz" with Bruce Lucas Productions, and she is also developing a paranormal-related television series for tweens. She has also contributed to over 50 inspirational books for PIL/New Seasons, as well as hundreds of articles, essays and stories in magazines, online ezines, newspapers and anthologies, including five Chicken Soup for the Soul books. She is now a regular contributor to Intrepid Magazine, and writes regularly for New Dawn Magazine and Phenomena Magazine.

item.title: Nick Redfern - Author - KEEP OUT Top Secret Places governments don't want you to know about
item.description: Join me this week as I talk with the Author of " KEEP OUT - TOP SECRET PLACES GOVERNMENTS DONT WANT YOU TO KNOW ABOUT "- Nick Redfern. We should also be talking about a few other things as this guy has tons of stuff under his belt. Nick Redfern is the author of more than 20 books, including Memoirs of a Monster Hunter; Celebrity Secrets; There’s something in the Woods; Contactees; Final Events; The Real Men in Black; The NASA Conspiracies; Science Fiction Secrets; On the Trail of the Saucer Spies; Strange Secrets; and – with fellow Texas-based researcher and author, Ken Gerhard – Monsters of Texas: Strange Creatures of the Lone Star State. He has appeared on such TV shows as the BBC’s Out of This World; the SyFy Channel’s Proof Positive; the History Channel’s Monster Quest and UFO Hunters; the National Geographic Channel’s Paranatural; and MSNBC’s Countdown. To see Nick on film, click on the following You Tube link. Filmed in the woods of Wisconsin in late-2009, it is an extract from the History Channel’s Monster Quest episode on Mothman. Scroll to the 7-Minute, 31-second mark to see the beginning of the section involving Nick: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4aC8F0X54V8 See also the following Fox News story from 2010 on Nick’s search for the legendary Chupacabra: http://www.okcfox.com/newsroom/special_reports/videos/vid_191

item.title: Susan Isabelle - 13th Crystal Skull Keeper
item.description:
How she came to the Keeper responsibility is quite a story in itself. So, we will share with you some of the details of her personal story so you may begin to understand the depths of this, " Indiana Jones!". Her books are available in our store and are filled with all the incredible details! Susan Isabelle was born in Massachusetts, USA in 1949. Her mother was from Canada and of the French and Iroquois Indian lineage. She inherited her fair complexion from her English father. She was raised by both parents in the 1960's during times of civil unrest while living in the deep south. She moved there with them when she was four years old. She grew up on the pristine beaches of the Gulf Coast spending time with a pet dolphin. The life-changing moment of impact occurred at age 12 when she made a trip to the north east, traveling up through the southern states. She saw the tragic situation of the black people from the back seat of the car; the visions of extremely poor, naked children playing outside their shacks on large plantation-style lands of the rich growing tobacco, still haunts her memories. Later, the visits with her father to bring food and help the black families that lived in the swampy back bay areas of Florida taught her the need for human compassion and the need to make changes in the world. At that time she vowed to help the people one day.She became an advocate of human rights at a very young age and fought hard for civil rights, even while in high school.... To read more about her go HERE

http://crystal-skulls-mayan.com/

Her books are available in our store and are filled with all the incredible details! Susan Isabelle was born in Massachusetts, USA in 1949. Her mother was from Canada and of the French and Iroquois Indian lineage. She inherited her fair complexion from her English father. She was raised by both parents in the 1960's during times of civil unrest while living in the deep south. She moved there with them when she was four years old. She grew up on the pristine beaches of the Gulf Coast spending time with a pet dolphin. The life-changing moment of impact occurred at age 12 when she made a trip to the north east, traveling up through the southern states. She saw the tragic situation of the black people from the back seat of the car; the visions of extremely poor, naked children playing outside their shacks on large plantation-style lands of the rich growing tobacco, still haunts her memories. Later, the visits with her father to bring food and help the black families that lived in the swampy back bay areas of Florida taught her the need for human compassion and the need to make changes in the world. At that time she vowed to help the people one day.She became an advocate of human rights at a very young age and fought hard for civil rights, even while in high school.... To read more about her go HERE http://crystal-skulls-mayan.com/

item.title: Thomas P Fusco-Author/Behind The Cosmic Veil
item.description: Join S.E.Burns and myself as we talk it up with the Author of a truly amazing theory and book! "Behind The Cosmic Veil" ....Thomas P Fusco Throughout modern history, humanity has made remarkable strides toward unraveling the secrets of the universe. Yet in spite of these impressive scientific achievements, certain fundamental mysteries continue to evade both our powers of reason and our modern physics. Among these are: - Is there a Divine Order within the cosmos? - What are the causes behind the bizarre events known as the paranormal? - Are anti-gravity, time travel and teleportation possible, or are they just food for fantasy? - How was matter created “from the void?” - Is there a gateway to a higher dimension, and what does it look like? - Is dark matter real, and why can’t we see it? - How did life originate on earth? - Could UFOs really be advanced spacecraft? - And how does religion and spirituality fit into all this? Questions like these have long confounded scientists, philosophers, and ecclesiastics alike. Efforts to solve these riddles have often suffered from too narrow a focus, such as those that attempt to describe telepathy or consciousness in terms of quantum theory while overlooking the vast body of other unexplained phenomena. None have led us to a single cosmological framework that can accommodate the wealth of scientific anomalies, spiritual experiences and paranormal events that are observed and recorded.
item.dc:creator: Robert Bradbury
item.itunes:summary:
Join S.E.Burns and myself as we talk it up with the Author of a truly amazing theory and book! "Behind The Cosmic Veil" ....Thomas P Fusco
Throughout modern history, humanity has made remarkable strides toward unraveling the secrets of the universe. Yet in spite of these impressive scientific achievements, certain fundamental mysteries continue to evade both our powers of reason and our modern physics. Among these are:
- Is there a Divine Order within the cosmos? - What are the causes behind the bizarre events known as the paranormal? - Are anti-gravity, time travel and teleportation possible, or are they just food for fantasy? - How was matter created “from the void?” - Is there a gateway to a higher dimension, and what does it look like? - Is dark matter real, and why can’t we see it? - How did life originate on earth? - Could UFOs really be advanced spacecraft? - And how does religion and spirituality fit into all this?
Questions like these have long confounded scientists, philosophers, and ecclesiastics alike. Efforts to solve these riddles have often suffered from too narrow a focus, such as those that attempt to describe telepathy or consciousness in terms of quantum theory while overlooking the vast body of other unexplained phenomena. None have led us to a single cosmological framework that can accommodate the wealth of scientific anomalies, spiritual experiences and paranormal events that are observed and recorded.

item.title: Jonathan Schang and Robert Clearfield of "District 97"
item.description: JOIN ME AS I TALK WITH TWO MEMBERS OF “DISTRICT 97″ THE DRUMMER JONATHAN SCHANG AND THE KEYBOARD PLAYER ROB CLEARFIELD. I HOPE TO FIND OUT WHAT DRIVES THIS YOUNG AMBITIOUS PROGRESSIVE BAND AND HOW THEY HAVE GROWN TOGETHER AS MUSICIANS. Jonathan Schang is proud to be the drummer and primary composer for District 97. In addition to his activities within the band, Jonathan is one of Chicago’s busiest and most in-demand Modern Dance Accompanists. He has been commissioned to write works for Deeply Rooted Dance Theater and Thodos Dance Chicago, with future collaborations in the works involving the most gifted members of Chicago’s thriving dance community. Having won numerous awards for both his compositional and drumset prowess, Jonathan has performed with Chicago’s most legendary musicians, including a national TV appearance with former Miles Davis Musical Director (1979-1988), Robert “Baabe” Irving III. In October 2010, Jonathan was signed as a Paiste Cymbals Artist. Fellow Paiste Artist Bill Bruford (Yes, King Crimson, Genesis, Earthworks etc.) calls District 97 “sensational” and says “Jonathan writes and plays like a demon.” The pair had a chance to meet and jam together in Memphis, TN in December 2010. From an early age, keyboardist Rob Clearfield has always shown a fascination in all types of music. From his humble beginnings playing grunge rock in his friends’ basements and accompanying choirs at his mother’s church, Clearfield has become a fixture on the Chicago music scene. Although perhaps a rocker at heart, Clearfield has made a name for himself as one of Chicago’s best improvisers, performing with such renowned artists as Fareed Haque, Rakalam Bob Moses, Grazyna Auguscik, Juma Santos, Steve Gorn, Zach Brock, John Wojciechowski and Greg Ward, among others. In addition to District 97, Rob Clearfield is also a member of Matt Ulery’s Loom and Greg Ward’s Fitted Shards, as well as his own band Information Superhighway. As a composer, Clearfield’s work with the Superhighway is only the beginning. In 2008, he was commissioned to score a production of MacBeth by Purdue University, and he is also currently the music director and composer-in-residence at the emergent church Wicker Park Grace in Chicago.
item.dc:creator: Robert Bradbury

item.title: Andrew Bowman-Religious Champion
item.description: This week I talked with a GRAND INSPIRATION for us all. I have talked about religions on a one on one basis in the past. This show I will be talking on a one on 12 basis! Sounds exciting I know! You must join in in the conversation! For Andrew Bowen, theology is a playground. A champion for inter-religious peace and reconciliation, Andrew created Project Conversion in 2011, a year-long personal immersion into the culture, practices, beliefs, and rituals of 12 belief systems from around the world. Coverage of his efforts has appeared in The Huffington Post, The American Baha’i, the Charlotte Observer, and more. His fiction and essays splash in the often murky waters of religion and spirituality, and have appeared in over a dozen venues like decomP, Prick of the Spindle, Pulp Metal Magazine, and Charlotte Viewpoint.

item.title: Jason Offutt-Black Eyed Kids
item.description: Jason Offutt’s books include, “Paranormal Missouri,” “What Lurks Beyond,” “Darkness Walks: Shadow People Among us,” “Haunted Missouri,” and the collection of humor essays, “On Being Dad.” Jason lives in Northwest Missouri where he teaches college journalism, and keeps humanity safe from the forces of evil. Jason’s newest book, “Paranormal Missouri: Show Me Your Monsters,” is available for order from Amazon.com. You can find more of Jason’s work at his blog, from-the-shadows.blogspot.com.

item.title: S.E. Burns - Don Smith - UFO Phil
item.description: S.E. Burns joins me as we talk with Don Smith about UFO Phil. This was suppose to be a different show but my guest had to cancel. These things happen and I try to make it work in any way I can. Enjoyable show so take a listen!

item.title: Philip Coppens- Ancient Aliens
item.description: Philip Coppens’ publishing career began at the age of 23, when he edited the legacy of the late Belgian historian Marcel Mestdagh’s research into European megaliths into a much-anticipated sequel. That same year, he also helped edit a controversial non-fiction thriller on the theft of Jan Van Eyck’s The Adoration of the Lamb, which was made into a documentary both for Flemish television and the BBC. If there is one thing that sets Coppens apart from other writers, it is that he is often ahead of the trends. He wrote the first guide in more than four decades about Rosslyn Chapel – the only one to do so before The Da Vinci Code made that Scottish chapel world famous in 2003. He also researched the origins of the Mitchell-Hedges Crystal Skull, before the 2008 Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull movie, resulting in a series of controversial articles, which even came to the attention of The Washington Post. Find more here---- >>>> http://tinyurl.com/7apv8he
item.dc:creator: Robert Bradbury

If there is one thing that sets Coppens apart from other writers, it is that he is often ahead of the trends. item.title: Helen Michaels and Lorraine Roe-"Audacious Action Angels" Oracle deck November 28th-7 PM EST
item.description: Join me next week as I talk with the creators of a deck of cards I thought were Tarot cards! I have talked with Tarot users and creators in the past but this time it is an ORACLE DECK! Very different.And very exciting to learn something new. Let us take this jouney together and see just what this is all about. Helen Michaels is a co-creator with Lorraine Roe of the Audacious Action Angels (AAA) Oracle Deck. Helen is an artist, Reiki practitioner, and a very experienced art therapist. She and Lorraine have been on a high octane spiritual journey for a few decades now and learning to live with their emerging psychic abilities. Much to their surprise, messages and information from the angelic and fairy realms are filled with wit and humor that end up piercing the ego's perspective - which isn't exactly the 'feel good' part! After Lorraine asked Helen to do up a few ideas for an oracle deck, Helen was downloaded with images, titles and basic structure for the deck in about 3 hours. Then she created a painting a day for more than a month to birth the deck into visual form. Although Helen is a life-long artist, she had not received creative inspiration "straight from God" in this way before, but laying a spiritual foundation was the first step. Helen is excited to collaborate with Lorraine and share their real life, on-going experience of embodying spirit.

item.itunes:summary:

Helen Michaels is a co-creator with Lorraine Roe of the Audacious Action Angels (AAA) Oracle Deck. Helen is an artist, Reiki practitioner, and a very experienced art therapist. She and Lorraine have been on a high octane spiritual journey for a few decades now and learning to live with their emerging psychic abilities. Much to their surprise, messages and information from the angelic and fairy realms are filled with wit and humor that end up piercing the ego's perspective - which isn't exactly the 'feel good' part! After Lorraine asked Helen to do up a few ideas for an oracle deck, Helen was downloaded with images, titles and basic structure for the deck in about 3 hours. Then she created a painting a day for more than a month to birth the deck into visual form. Although Helen is a life-long artist, she had not received creative inspiration "straight from God" in this way before, but laying a spiritual foundation was the first step. Helen is excited to collaborate with Lorraine and share their real life, on-going experience of embodying spirit.

item.title: Raeanne Bartlett and Alix Chavasse- "Pamela Courson Morrison"-Nov. 21-7 PM EST
item.description: Join me on Monday as I talk with Raeanne Bartlett and Alix Chavasse who are currently researching and writing a book that explores the tumultuous lives and relationship of The Doors' singer Jim Morrison and his common law muse Pamela Courson. They run a tribute website to honor the late Ms. Courson, who was a huge inspiration for a major influence on not only the Jim Morrison of The Doors, but also for many in the fashion world then and now. A tribute to the beautiful Pamela Courson Morrison, may she rest in peace. ♥ I think that Pamela has been greatly misunderstood, misjudged, and undercredited for her contributions in inspiring some of the world's best known rock songs, styling Jim, and being a fashion icon of the 60's. Pamela remains a beautiful mystery, someone who continues to fascinate people and spark interest in a culturally pivotal time in American history. Check out their site here --- > http://pamelacourson.tumblr.com/

item.title: Janine Kelly and Dr Jen Maher-Divorce and domestic violence
item.description: This was definitely a difficult show as I was trying to keep from having a biased perspective. I love the fact that there are people out there trying to make a difference in the world and not expect payment or recognition. Perhaps this is a turning point for the show. I have been truly moved by tonight's show. take a listen. Very touchy and important subject so be kind.
